titles.title: CAPE Canaveral Act
CAPE Canaveral Act
Consolidating Aerospace Programs Efficiently at Canaveral Act
A bill to require the headquarters of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to be transferred to Brevard County, Florida.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Consolidating Aerospace Programs Efficiently at Canaveral Act or the CAPE Canaveral Act
This bill requires the headquarters of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to be relocated to Brevard County, Florida within one year of the billâ€™s enactment.
